question: 紹介状
sourceMnemonic: Remember how a <ja>年賀状</ja> is a new year's card? This is another kind of card/letter, but this time it's for an introduction (<ja>紹介</ja>), making it a <vocabulary>letter of introduction</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Will help to know <ja>紹介</ja> as well.
